target_assessment.type_match_reasoning: The audit reported no findings and classified the contract as safe, completely missing the critical access_control vulnerability in createLockedCampaign() where an arbitrary external call is made to a user-provided tokenLocker address.

notes: The audit completely failed to identify the documented critical vulnerability. The createLockedCampaign() function at lines 53-80 makes an arbitrary external call to donation.tokenLocker (line 66) with user-controlled parameters. This allows attackers to provide a malicious contract address that can execute arbitrary code with the privileges of any user who has approved Hedgey to spend their tokens, leading to theft. This is a classic access_control vulnerability through untrusted external calls.
